data.name: Gladiator Beast Hoplomus
data.desc: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster, its original DEF becomes 2400. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked: You can shuffle it into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster from your Deck, except "Gladiator Beast Hoplomus".

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack
